Desc.entry: An amateur dramatics group based in the French Department at the University of Sheffield. The society is made up of permanent members of staff, post graduates, ERASMUS exchange students and undergraduates of French. The Society's core activity is the production and performance of a play in French at the University Drama Studio (usually in March or April). Also available for school visits and festival performances.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various days and times, please contact for details
